backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining sessions, participants, messages, and logic for creating/joining sessions with limits and typing/video call support.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a footer text update affecting LandingPage.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style file defining OKLCH color tokens, light/dark mode variables, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that restores or sets session state and renders LandingPage or ChatPage accordingly.
frontend/src/components/actions/CopyCode: Copy-to-clipboard button with fallback and visual feedback icons.
frontend/src/components/chat/AttachmentC: Chat input with file picker, image preview, size validation, typing signals, and send handling.
frontend/src/components/chat/Participant: Renders participant list with typing indicators and highlights the current user.
frontend/src/components/feedback/InlineE: Small reusable inline error box with icon and styled message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidating dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder exporting nothing to allow custom query hooks elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionPolling.ts: Polls session data via react-query and exposes helpers for sending messages and updating video call URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useTypingSignal.ts: Sends throttled typing indicators to the backend and manages typing timeout state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/attachments.ts: Utilities for file handling, including reading files, detecting images, creating blob URLs, and formatting sizes.
frontend/src/lib/linkify.tsx: Parses text for URLs and returns React nodes with clickable links.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Handles storing, retrieving, and clearing session data and participant IDs in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into human-readable date or time strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Renders the chat interface, handling messaging, attachments, typing signals, scrolling, and video call URL updates.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: UI for creating or joining sessions, interacting with the backend and storing session details.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata defining app goals, existing features, known issues, and the current rebuild plan for a no-login web chat.
